Reviews.Title: “Nice place, very friendly”
Reviews.Author: MartynG_11
Reviews.Content: read reviews suggested basic indeed found staying nice experience clean hotel overlooking santa maria elisabetta super quiet enjoyed free wireless downstairs lobby ac fan fine staff encountered personable friendly definitely feel welcome tend remember

Reviews.Title: “Fine, Budget Option in great Neighbourhood on Lido”
Reviews.Author: wanda79
Reviews.Content: simple clean budget hotel location lido lovely bustling neighbourhood 5 mins vaporetto 15 20 mins journey st marks square didnt breakfast basic hotel looking clean bed nice safe perfect

Reviews.Title: “Two words: BED BUGS.”

Reviews.Content: impressions walking lobby seedy sitting counter computer notepads drag luggage stairs lifts reached actual keys door 5 minutes look able unlock door greeted strange bleach smell bathroom clean nice tiny analogue tv remote didnt bed actually singles pushed double sheet night sleeping woke red bites body attacked bed bugs acceptable recommended hotel time reception website advertise buffet breakfast sort nor internet access described worth money spent cheap
